properties.name: eureka.server.enable-self-preservation
properties.description: Enable self-preservation mode in Eureka server.

properties.name: eureka.server.renewal-percent-threshold
properties.description: The minimum percentage of renewals that is expected from the clients in the specified renewal interval.

properties.name: eureka.server.eviction-interval-timer-in-ms
properties.description: The time interval with which the task that expires instances should wake up and run.

properties.name: eureka.server.response-cache-update-interval-ms
properties.description: The time interval with which the payload cache of the client should be updated.

properties.name: eureka.server.response-cache-auto-expiration-in-seconds
properties.description: The time for which the registry payload should be kept in the cache if it is not invalidated by change events.
